title: Tailspin Tommy in the Great Air Mystery

sources.title: The Great Air Mystery (1935) TAILSPIN TOMMYüçï12-CHAPTER CLIFFHANGER
sources.description:
PizzaFLIX Marathon Edition! Complete 12-chapter Cliffhanger!
Starring: Clark Williams, Jean Rogers, Noah Beery, Jr.
Directed by: Ray Taylor

Tailspin Tommy and his fellow pilots, Betty Lou Barnes and Skeeter Milligan, must foil prevent a group of corrupt businessmen from stealing Nazil Island's valuable oil reserves. 

Tailspin Tommy and his fellow pilots, Betty Lou Barnes and Skeeter Milligan, must foil a plot of American gangsters to steal the valuable oil reserves of a small American Island.

üçïCHAPTERSüçï
0:00       PizzaFLIX Intro
1:07       CHAPTER 1: Wreck of the Dirigible
21:59     CHAPTER 2: The Roaring Fire God
42:36     CHAPTER 3: Hurled from the Skies
1:03:45  CHAPTER 4: A Bolt from the Blue
1:21:33  CHAPTER 5: The Torrent
1:41:29  CHAPTER 6: Flying Death
2:01:38  CHAPTER 7: The Crash in the Clouds
2:22:06  CHAPTER 8: Wings of Disaster
2:40:16  CHAPTER 9: Crossed and Double Crossed
2:59:59  CHAPTER 10: The Dungeon of Doom
3:18:59  CHAPTER 11: Desperate Chances
3:38:22  CHAPTER 12: The Last Stand
3:57:28  Please Subscribe!

metadata.Plot: A 12-episode serial in which Tailspin Tommy evades volcanoes, anti-aircraft shells, and time bombs as he foils a plan by corrupt profiteers to steal an island's oil reserves.
metadata.Writer: Hal Forrest, Raymond Cannon, Ella O'Neill
metadata.Actors: Clark Williams, Jean Rogers, Delphine Drew
